message.body: Hey. Sorry to bother but is there a reason why Phuong isn't answering our group chat? I wanted to make sure she was okay.
I don't know. Michael thinks she just doesn't want to talk to us. You should call her out on it because I was wondering the same thing.
I just text her and said "hey everything okay? Haven't heard from you."
If she doesn't answer then the next time I text you guys, I'm leaving her out.
I don't think Phuong is getting any group message. She text me back as if nothing was wrong and when I asked about the group messages, she said "what messages?"
